content: easy afghan stitch squares are embroidered in cross stitch with contrary miss mary and her growing garden gauge 25 stitches and 19 row in 6½ in afghan/tunisian crochet stitch you will need coats & clark s red heart knitting worsted 4 ply in the following amounts and colors thirteen 4 ounce skeins of white one 1 ounce skein each of dark blue and rose two 1 ounce skeins each of orange and light blue three 1 ounce skeins of green one 1/3 ounce skein each of black pink and scarlet the young in heart of any age will love this beautiful afghan with mistress mary surrounded by colorful flowers a solid white background is made in afghan stitch and then the cross-stitch designs are embroidered in brilliant garden colors you will need a number 8 afghan hook - this is a standard size hook with a long shank or handle which holds the loops picked up across each row the completed afghan measures about 51 x 65 inches
